Failed to upload log, please try again
You are taking part in the User Experience Program

"User Experience Program
Xiaomi Communication Technology Co Ltd (hereinafter referred to as "Xiaomi" or "we") sincerely invite you to join the "Mi router User Experience Improvement Program". In order to better provide you with a new generation of intelligent devices. We will need to use your statistics collected from the mobile app, then through using this statistical data improve the Mi WiFi phone app and give a better user experience to everyone.
Please be assured, we will keep all of your data private, statistics only include the frequency of using when using the Mi router app. Anonymous data is collected to improve Xiaomi products and services. SMS and Phone records are not collected.
1. Joining and leaving the program You are free to choose whether or not to join the program, after joining you can at any time through the app settings page opt to exit the program. If necessary you can always opt out. You can easily join the program at any time to help us improve our products and services.
2. Scope of this plan Provided you allow use to collect statistical data to help us improve the Mi router app, phone compatibility, stability and ease of use, including: （1）The latest version of the Mi WiFi operating system ROM, more timely fixes to all kinds of problems, further improving the stability of the system to make a better product; （2）A better fit for your Internet service provider (ISP), providing different types of network service (ADSL, Fibre optic etc); （3）Help you better understand the number of devices connected, duration, disk usage. Ensure also that the Mi router can ensure compatibility and stability for all attached devices; （4）Use the Mi router to intelligently control your surroundings. Also improve relevant functions for devices and Mi router connectivity; （5）Mi router plugins system (Games, Download speed, Ad blocking) providing anonymous statistical information to the developer. Help improve the platform and plugins available to make a better user experience.
3. Updates to this program According to the continuous improvement and renewal of the Mi router series products, we may from time to time have to modify this plan, we will inform you through the app of any such changes. If you did not change the user experience improvement program status this indicates you accept the modifications and continue to participate in the program.
Xiaomi Corporation, Beijing, China. Last updated: October 2014 "
Join the User Experience Program to help improve our products. [View details]
